name: get_all_verse_of_chapter_by_chapter_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bhagavad_gita_v3.
Tool description: This is api for the Bhagavad Gita book. A Hindu scripture.
API description: Fetches all verses from a specific chapter in the Bhagavad Gita by chapter ID.

chapterid.description: The ID of the chapter whose verses are to be fetched.
